arthur-costa.name: Arthur Costa
arthur-costa.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer & Tech Lead
arthur-costa.bio: Senior Full-Stack Engineer with 8+ years in React, TypeScript, and Node.js. Expert in performance optimization and leading engineering teams.
arthur-costa.long_bio:
Arthur Costa is a seasoned software engineer with over 8 years of experience building scalable web applications and leading engineering teams. Currently working as a Senior Full-Stack Engineer at a leading tech company, Arthur has a passion for modern JavaScript ecosystems, performance optimization, and developer experience.

He has contributed to numerous open-source projects and is particularly interested in React's concurrent features, TypeScript's advanced type system, and web performance optimization. Arthur regularly speaks at tech conferences and mentors junior developers.

When he's not coding, Arthur enjoys contributing to the tech community through blog posts, open-source contributions, and speaking engagements. He believes in sharing knowledge and helping others grow in their technical careers.
achievements: Led migration of legacy system serving 1M+ users
Reduced application load time by 60% through optimization

lucas-oliveira.name: Lucas Oliveira
lucas-oliveira.title: Backend Engineer & API Architect
lucas-oliveira.bio: Backend Engineer with 6+ years in API design and microservices. Expert in Node.js, Python, and Go development for scalable systems.
lucas-oliveira.long_bio:
Lucas Oliveira is a backend engineer with 6+ years of experience specializing in API design, microservices architecture, and cloud-native applications. He has a strong background in Node.js, Python, and Go, with extensive experience in designing and implementing RESTful and GraphQL APIs that serve millions of requests daily.

Lucas is passionate about system design, database optimization, and creating developer-friendly APIs. He has worked with startups and established companies, helping them scale their backend infrastructure and improve their development workflows.

He's also an advocate for TypeScript and strongly-typed systems, believing that good type safety leads to more maintainable and reliable software. In his spare time, Lucas contributes to open-source projects and writes about backend development, API design, and system architecture.
achievements: Reduced database query time by 75% through optimization
Authored API design guidelines adopted company-wide
